items.name: Goldwyrm
enchantMods: 16% increased Attack and Cast Speed if you've Killed Recently
implicitMods: Regenerate 100 Life per second while moving
explicitMods: 60% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
20% increased Quantity of Items found
+41% to Fire Resistance
10% increased Movement Speed
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 14% increased Critical Strike Chance
Supported Skills have 54% chance to gain a Power Charge on Critical Strike
Supported Skills deal 4% more Damage per Power Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports bow attack skills, causing them to trigger when you've spent enough mana in total on other bow attacks. Cannot modify the skills of minions. Cannot support totems, traps, mines, Vaal skills, or channelling skills
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 31% less Damage
Supported Skills deal 1% more Damage with Hits and Ailments per 1 Mana Cost

Supported Skills Trigger once total Mana Spent on other Bow
Attacks exceeds 300% of their Mana Cost
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow that remains in the ground behind its final target, tethering that enemy to it. Ensnared enemies always count as moving, and have less movement speed while trying to break the snare. The snare will break if they leave the area of effect.
explicitMods: 20% increased Area of Effect
Ensnared Enemies take 20% increased Projectile Damage from Attack Hits
Each Snare applies 40% less Movement Speed to Normal or Magic Enemies
Each Snare applies 30% less Movement Speed to Rare Enemies
Each Snare applies 25% less Movement Speed to Unique Enemies
Maximum 3 Snares per Enemy
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs an attack that gives the character a frenzy charge if it hits. Frenzy charges increase your attack speed.
explicitMods: 5% more Attack Damage per Frenzy Charge
5% more Attack Speed per Frenzy Charge
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Kaom's Spirit
implicitMods: Attacks have +0.69% to Critical Strike Chance
explicitMods: +64 to maximum Life
+30% to Fire Resistance

Life Recovery from Regeneration is not applied

flavourText: Who can tell when whispers are truly from a god?

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 40% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a warcry, taunting all nearby enemies to attack the user and granting endurance charges. Gives a brief burst of life regeneration, as well as a buff which grants resistances and physical damage reduction based on your endurance charges.

Regenerate 1976 Life over 1 second
80% increased Warcry Speed
Counts total Power of Enemies in Range
Gain 1 Endurance Charge per 5 Power
Buff grants 2% additional Physical Damage Reduction per Endurance Charge

60% increased Mana Regeneration Rate

socketedItems.secDescrText: Applies a buff that protects the lower half of your life, preventing some of the immediate life loss when damaged by hits and applying the loss over time instead. Your life cannot be raised above low life other than by flasks, and while above low life, skills will cost life as well as mana.
explicitMods:
Life Recovery other than Flasks cannot Recover Life to above Low Life
When taking Damage from Hits, 40% of Life loss below half Life is Prevented, then 75% of Life loss prevented this way is lost over 4 seconds
Skills gain a Base Life Cost equal to 40% of Base Mana Cost while not on Low Life
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
